website_summaries.verdict: If you have patience and earplugs, the Salton Harley Pasternak blender fulfills its promise to make powerful blending affordable.
pros: The Salton Harley Pasternak Blender does the job of high-powered machines that cost twice as much, and with style
cons: You'll need extra patience to use this blender, as it takes longer to complete tougher tasks than similarly powered blenders from Vitamix, Blendtec or Ninja
It's also loud, so you can't just turn it on and ignore it while it works

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very comparable to a VitaMix without the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Received pre-opened, pre-used unit
customer_reviews.text: I am very upset. I purchased a NEW blender. What I received is legally considered "refurbished". It was clearly opened before. The box is all beaten up, with lots of different shipping type labels and it was not sealed. The inside of the cover of the beverage cup has wear as does the manual. The entire blender has finger prints all over it. If I wanted refurbished, then I would have paid a lot less and chosen such a unit. You cannot charge me full price and tell me its brand new when it's not. I have pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Lastoria

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a hard time chopping up certain foods...cauliflower for instance...which I find strange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't find Better Value!
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these, one in my summer home in Peterborough Ontario and the other here in Maricopa Arizona. For the price you can not find a better power blender. Each one only cost me $150.00 so got both for less than the price of ONE VitaMix. Has all the power you could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle20075

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this blender the first few times I used it. after a few smoothies and one time making sauce. And now it turns on for less than a second and shuts off. I made absolutely sure I followed all the cleaning and care directions. I wish I could say it's burning out because I overloaded it or didn't try my hardest to take care of it. But I did and it's just not as high quality as I thought it was. Really really bummed!!
customer_reviews.author: ketina Barnes

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work properly... blender cup did ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work properly...blender cup did not fit properly in base....I think you can find something comparable for less $$
customer_reviews.author: Tiz

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This blender is a real disappointment. The jar leaks from the bottom. The motor now makes this horrible sound that it did not make at first and it does not blend all that well at all. Leaves many unprocessed chunks of fruit. Don't waste your money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Guerino Ricioppo

customer_reviews.title: Blender is a year and a half old, we ...
customer_reviews.text: Blender is a year and a half old, we probably use it on average 3 times a week. The bottom of the pitcher where it sits on the base broke and we can't find a single replacement part for sale online
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is so great I stored my perfectly working Cuisinart blender
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, works perfectly,.nothing is complicated with this blender..... sometimes when you start in the suggested slowest level, the motor hums a little but that is normal if you put hard vegetables or frozen fruit packed at the bottom, but when you turn the knob to faster speeds it just obliterates everything, smooth results everytime. I even made hot soup with it. It is so great I stored my perfectly working Cuisinart blender,...maybe for good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Harley vs Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: I should give it a five but that would be rewarding it for being a copy cat. This machine down to the sprocket on top performs as well as the one sold and demo at the big box store based out ok Kirkland WA..The rice to flour demo was very impressive. If your wanting a product based on name alone purchase a Vitamix, but if your looking to get value for your dollar the Harley will impress. Re-review, do not start with ice on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: amazon sympathizer

customer_reviews.title: ... using it and it seems to be working perfectly love
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it and it seems to be working perfectly love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used daily, sometimes more
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been drinking green smoothies for about 2 years. We'd just learned to live with the results of our regular blender. I found this blender on sale and made a leap. This machine blends EVERYTHING smooth. We do not use ice to make them we use about a cup of water and frozen fruit. There are no kale bits or tiny blueberry or other fruit seeds when using this blender.. The seeds were the worst. I have made coffee drinks with ice, no problem, they are smooth as well. I have started using this blender instead of my food processor for a lot of things. This blender is amazing. We use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Harley Pasternak Power Blender in Red
product_meta.description: This machine does it all. The Harley Pasternak Power Blender blends, crushes, emulsifies, chops, purees, liquefies, and even prepares hot foods in minutes. Its cloverleaf shape inside the jar helps create a vortex that ensures all food is blended.
feature_bullets: Cloverleaf shape inside jar helps create a vortex so that food is blended thoroughly
Harley Pasternak Power Blender blends, crushes, emulsifies, chops, purees, liquefies and prepares hot foods such as soups and sauces in minutes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars14 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
